name: Invisible Fraud
description: Cybercriminals have more recently been focusing on taking advantage of fraudulent gift cards, since gift cards are spent on a third-party website, which do not access bank to bank transactions. Even though the victims have detected the fraud, they cannot report the scam to get the money back from the bank. This game “Invisible Fraud” increases people’s awareness of online scams in order to reduce the customer’s risk of losing more money.
